SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.socket

Class ServerForSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.socket.ServerForSocket
public class ServerForSocket extends Object
Server notifies the controller of changes made by the player in the view when Socket communication is used.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect(SocketHandler client, String username)
      Method used to connect an username to a client.
      Parameters:
      client - the representation of the client.
      username - the username of the player to connect.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(String username)
      Method used to disconnect an username from the game.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player to disconnect.

    • placeStarter

      public void placeStarter(String username, Side side)
      Method used to place the starter card of the username in a specific side.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player who performs the placement.
      side - the selected side of the starter card.

    • chooseColor

      public void chooseColor(String username, PlayerColor color)
      Method used to assign the color to the username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player who has chosen the color.
      color - the color chosen by the player.

    • placeObjectiveCard

      public void placeObjectiveCard(String username, int chosenObjective)
      Method used to place the chosenObjective of the username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player.
      chosenObjective - the objective card chosen by the player.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String username, int frontId, int backId, Side side, Position position)
      Method used to place a card in a specific frontId,backId, side and position.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player.
      frontId - the identification of the front of the card.
      backId - the identification of the back of the card.
      side - the selected side of the card.
      position - the selected position to place the card.

    • draw

      public void draw(String username, int idToDraw)
      Method used to draw a card.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player.
      idToDraw - the identification of the card to draw.

      Method used to send a new message

    • setPlayersNumber

      public void setPlayersNumber(String username, int playersNumber)
      Method used to choose the playersNumber of the game.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player who chooses the playersNumber.
      playersNumber - the number of players allowed in the game.
